hero.title: Discover the Soul
hero.description_2: Have your own room and share some common spaces
hero.description_3: Have a private or shared room in a boutique hotel, hostel, and more
hero.description_4: Stay in a shared space, like a common room

about: Welcome to our charming Marrakech apartments! Located in vibrant neighborhoods, our spaces blend modern comfort with Moroccan style. Perfect for both short and long stays, we offer all the amenities you need for a memorable visit. We look forward to hosting you!
service: With all the conditions for your maximum comfort.
